item.title: The Effort Report Podcast
item.description: I wanted to give a quick shoutout to the Effort Report Podcast hosted by Roger Peng and Elizabeth Matsui. Both hosts are faculty members at Johns Hopkins (School of Public Health & School of Medicine) and they discuss issues that any budding academic should consider. I’ve listened to every podcast (some multiple times) and I’ve even joined the conversation on Twitter.
